bond (esp. document split in two, with each party holding one half)/contract/deed (i.e. title deeds)/ticket/voucher/certificate

sentences.english: The trust group will not bear loss of the entrusted company.
sentences.chinese: 托管组不承担被托管证券公司的亏损。

sentences.english: It would be only the second Chinese brokerage firm to launch an IPO.
sentences.chinese: 光大证券将成为第二家进行IPO的中国证券公司。

sentences.english: Do pair of hackers trade on stockjobber net with respect to impregnable ?

sentences.english: A number of securities companies were closed or temporary closed for reorganizing because of irregular operations.
sentences.chinese: 部分证券公司因违规经营被撤销或停业整顿。

sentences.english: Securities companies shall not procure the underwriting business with improper means of competition.
sentences.chinese: 证券公司不得以不正当竞争手段招揽证券承销业务。

sentences.english: You securities companies in the software used Longsheng what?
sentences.chinese: 您在证券公司用过钱龙软件么？

sentences.english: The financial Futures will bring challenges to the securities invigilation in China.
sentences.chinese: 金融期货业务将给我国的证券公司监管带来挑战。

sentences.english: The third part was dealing with the non-bankruptcy relief system in reality.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是对现实的证券公司非破产救济制度的分析。

sentences.english: That is what a number of securities firms have been quietly doing.
sentences.chinese: 很多证券公司过去一直在默默地做着这样的事情。

sentences.english: Securities companies shall be analogically governed by these Measures.
sentences.chinese: 证券公司参照执行本办法。

sentences.english: The guaranteed amount a security company provides should not exceed 20% of its net assets.
sentences.chinese: 证券公司提供的担保额不得超过其净资产额的20%。
广东证券公司网上行情系统。

sentences.english: The Xiaozhu that goes to work in stockjobber is a netizen.
